title: Salsa Restaurant
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, American, Take-out, Mexican, Southwestern, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Southwestern American and Mexican food. Has a veggie burrito, veggie burger (vegan request guacamole instead of mayo), and veggie fajitas, all of which can be ordered without cheese and sour cream. Vegan appetizers are limited to chips and salsa and guacamole; there are 3 different types of salsa. Lunch menu includes a southwest veggie wrap and daily rotating specials are typically local and organic and include at least one vegetarian dish which is sometimes vegan.
